title: INTEGRATION_world test failure on gazebo_2.1 branch

content.raw:
The INTEGRATION_world test seems to be passing in default but failing in gazebo_2.1 ([Jenkins test failed to run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-gazebo_2.1-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/8/testReport/%28root%29/INTEGRATION_world/test_ran/) due to segfault). According to Jenkins console output, it seg-faults during the second test, which involves loading a world with the pioneer2dx (which has a model plugin) and clearing that model:
~~~
159: [==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
159: [----------] Global test environment set-up.
159: [----------] 2 tests from WorldTest
159: [ RUN      ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld
159: 
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.174
159: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
159: [       OK ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld (11539 ms)
159: [ RUN      ] WorldTest.Clear
159: 
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.174
159: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
35/56 Test #159: INTEGRATION_world .......................***Exception: SegFault 27.03 sec
~~~

Backtrace indicates a seg-fault in the plugin callback function OnUpdate:
~~~
[==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 2 tests from WorldTest
[ RUN      ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld
...
[       OK ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld (12185 ms)
[ RUN      ] WorldTest.Clear
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff7b7fe700 (LWP 17397)]
0x00007fffd17d5930 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fffd17d5930 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007fffac4e2f71 in gazebo::DiffDrivePlugin::OnUpdate (this=0x7fff6c07a0b0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/plugins/DiffDrivePlugin.cc:122
#2  0x00007ffff765a2e2 in operator() (a0=..., this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:760
#3  gazebo::event::EventT<void (gazebo::common::UpdateInfo const&)>::Signal<gazebo::common::UpdateInfo>(gazebo::common::UpdateInfo const&) (this=
    0x7ffff7dd88c0 <gazebo::event::Events::worldUpdateBegin>, _p=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:264
#4  0x00007ffff764920d in operator()<gazebo::common::UpdateInfo> (_p=..., 
    this=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:134
#5  gazebo::physics::World::Update (this=this@entry=0x7fffd1920430)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:620
#6  0x00007ffff7653094 in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=this@entry=0x7fffd1920430)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:551
#7  0x00007ffff76544bd in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (this=0x7fffd1920430)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:404
#8  0x00007ffff596a6c9 in ?? () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.49.0
#9  0x00007ffff65dce9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fff7b7fe700) at pthread_create.c:308
#10 0x00007ffff47ea3fd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#11 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb)
~~~

The main testing thread is at [world.cc:57](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bc556c87a28a89ea257cfa33c9a345a6b713197f/test/integration/world.cc?at=gazebo_2.1#cl-57) at the time of the seg-fault, right after World::Clear() has been called:
~~~
(gdb) thread apply all bt
...
Thread 1 (Thread 0x7fffdd786840 (LWP 17321)):
#0  clock_nanosleep (clock_id=<optimized out>, flags=<optimized out>, req=<optimized out>, 
    rem=<optimized out>) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/clock_nanosleep.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff7bafc06 in gazebo::common::Time::Sleep (_time=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Time.cc:195
#2  0x00007ffff7bb0033 in gazebo::common::Time::MSleep (_ms=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Time.cc:214

#3  0x000000000044dd0a in WorldTest_Clear_Test::TestBody (this=0x72b650)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/integration/world.cc:57
#4  0x00000000004920ca in HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (
    method=<optimized out>, object=<optimized out>, location=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2090
#5  testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (
    object=object@entry=0x72b650, method=&virtual testing::Test::TestBody(), 
    location=location@entry=0x49a733 "the test body")
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126
#6  0x0000000000487389 in testing::Test::Run (this=this@entry=0x72b650)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2162
#7  0x0000000000487467 in testing::TestInfo::Run (this=0x721f10)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2338
#8  0x00000000004875a5 in testing::TestCase::Run (this=0x721e50)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2445
#9  0x000000000048790d in RunAllTests (this=0x721b40)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4237
#10 testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests (this=0x721b40)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4145
#11 0x0000000000491c4a in HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (method=<optimized out>, object=<optimized out>, location=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2090
#12 testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (object=0x721b40, method=
    (bool (testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::*)(testing::internal::UnitTestImpl * const)) 0x487620 <testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()>, 
    location=location@entry=0x49b8f8 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)") at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126
#13 0x0000000000486be1 in testing::UnitTest::Run (this=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:3874
#14 0x000000000044ae1f in main (argc=1, argv=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/integration/world.cc:70
(gdb) 
~~~
I wonder if the fixes to the Event class in pull request #777 have fixed this on default?
content.html:
The INTEGRATION_world test seems to be passing in default but failing in gazebo_2.1 (Jenkins test failed to run due to segfault). According to Jenkins console output, it seg-faults during the second test, which involves loading a world with the pioneer2dx (which has a model plugin) and clearing that model:

159: [==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
159: [----------] Global test environment set-up.
159: [----------] 2 tests from WorldTest
159: [ RUN      ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld
159: 
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.174
159: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
159: [       OK ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld (11539 ms)
159: [ RUN      ] WorldTest.Clear
159: 
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
159: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.174
159: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
35/56 Test #159: INTEGRATION_world .......................***Exception: SegFault 27.03 sec

Backtrace indicates a seg-fault in the plugin callback function OnUpdate:

[==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 2 tests from WorldTest
[ RUN      ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld
...
[       OK ] WorldTest.ClearEmptyWorld (12185 ms)

Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.12 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff7b7fe700 (LWP 17397)]
0x00007fffd17d5930 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fffd17d5930 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007fffac4e2f71 in gazebo::DiffDrivePlugin::OnUpdate (this=0x7fff6c07a0b0)

    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:760

    0x7ffff7dd88c0 <gazebo::event::Events::worldUpdateBegin>, _p=...)

    this=<optimized out>)

#5  gazebo::physics::World::Update (this=this@entry=0x7fffd1920430)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:620
#6  0x00007ffff7653094 in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=this@entry=0x7fffd1920430)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:551

The main testing thread is at world.cc:57 at the time of the seg-fault, right after World::Clear() has been called:

...
Thread 1 (Thread 0x7fffdd786840 (LWP 17321)):
#0  clock_nanosleep (clock_id=<optimized out>, flags=<optimized out>, req=<optimized out>,

    location=location@entry=0x49b8f8 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)") at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126

    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/test/integration/world.cc:70

I wonder if the fixes to the Event class in pull request #777 have fixed this on default?
